panels.content:
<style type="text/css">
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content {
overflow: hidden;
}
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content iframe {
height:225px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
var weatherProperties = 'lat=-27.45&lon=153.0&color=#469FB3&text-color=#469FB3&units=ca';
 
// initial load
document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'https://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties;
 
// refresh
var weatherRefresh = setInterval(function() { document.getElementById('embedweather').src = 'https://forecast.io/embed/?ts=' + (Date.now()) + '#' + weatherProperties; }, 1800000);
 
</script>
<iframe id="embedweather" height="100%" src="#" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; width:100%; position:relative; top:-50px; overflow:hidden; margin-bottom: -70px;"></iframe>

<style type="text/css">
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content {
overflow: hidden;
}
p.markdown-html.panel-text-content iframe {
height:320px;
}
</style>
<script type="text/javascript">
var weatherPropertiesx = 'lat=-27.45&lon=153.0&color=#FFFFFF&text-color=#FFFFFF&units=ca';
 
// initial load
document.getElementById('embedweatherx').src = 'https://api.weather.com/v2/maps/dynamic?geocode=-27.45,153.00&h=320&w=568&lod=8&product=satrad&map=light&format=jpg&language=en&apiKey=<see api.weather.com>&a=0';
 
// refresh
var weatherRefreshx = setInterval(function() { document.getElementById('embedweatherx').src = 'https://api.weather.com/v2/maps/dynamic?geocode=-27.45,153.00&h=320&w=568&lod=8&product=satrad&map=light&format=jpg&language=en&apiKey=<see api.weather.com>&a=0'; }, 1800000);
 
</script>
<iframe id="embedweatherx" height="100%" src="#" style="margin: 0; padding: 0; border: none; width:100%; position:relative; overflow:hidden;"></iframe>
panels.title: Current cloud and rain radar

panels.content:
Solar Spy displays real time telemetry of Solar, Battery and Grid energy usage from a Queenslander style home.

The monitoring system is a custom solution which interfaces with a Sungrow SH5K Solar inverter with an attached GCL E-Kwbe Battery.

Additional information provided by Dark Sky for weather forecasts and weather.com for the rain and cloud radar. Solar PV forecasts provided by the Australian Solar Energy Forecasting System (ASEFS) Phase 2 and Solcast.

For more information, see the Solariot and mySolarForecast github projects. Contact Dennis at dennis@mellican.com.
panels.title: About
